summary: The 2023 World Snooker Championship was held in Sheffield, England, from April 15 to May 1. It was the last tournament of the 2022-23 season, with a total prize of Â£2,395,000. Ronnie O'Sullivan was the defending champion but lost in the quarterfinals. Luca Brecel, a Belgian player, won the championship, defeating Mark Selby in the final. This made Brecel the first European champion in snooker. The tournament had many exciting moments, including two maximum breaks and 90 century breaks on the main stage.
title: 2023 World Snooker Championship
